definition: to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: So the dishcloth to often take out, can destroy most bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 所以抹布要时常拿出来晒一下，就能消灭大部分细菌。

sentences.english: Do wipe the rubber clean with a damp cloth if the shoes get dirty.
sentences.chinese: 如果您的登山鞋脏了，要用湿抹布擦拭橡胶部分。

sentences.english: I just want to wash out one or two rags.
sentences.chinese: 我正想洗出一两块抹布。

sentences.english: There are some cloths in the closet. Use those to clean the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 柜子里有几块抹布，拿来擦擦厨房。

sentences.english: Our company is a professional non-woven cleaning cloth manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是专业无纺布清洁抹布厂家。

sentences.english: II. Take a clean rag or cloth with acetone and apply to the joint.
sentences.chinese: 拿一块干净的抹布或蘸有丙酮的布擦拭接合处。

sentences.english: Those old clothes may come in for dusters .
sentences.chinese: 那些旧衣服可用来作抹布。

sentences.english: My towel is used by my brother as a mob for the cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 我的毛巾被我哥哥当抹布用来打扫卫生了。

sentences.english: He cleaned the car with an oily rag.
sentences.chinese: 他用一块沾油的抹布擦干净汽车。

sentences.english: Pampers offers a full range of wipes based upon your baby's special needs.
sentences.chinese: 帮宝适提供了全方位的抹布根据您宝宝的特殊需要。

sentences.english: Wiping the dirty cloth used to wash water.
sentences.chinese: 抹布擦脏了要用清水洗净。

sentences.english: I simply swaddle my quart jar in several kitchen towels .
sentences.chinese: 我只是简单地把七块厨房用的抹布将夸脱罐子包上。

sentences.english: Sometimes all it takes is a wipe with a damp rag.
sentences.chinese: 有时候它起的作用和抹布抹一下差不多。

sentences.english: Spritz on windows and wipe clean with paper towels or a clean microfiber cloth.
sentences.chinese: 喷在窗户上，然后用纸巾或者软抹布擦干。

sentences.english: Add inside cistern set net wearing, can deposit dishcloth to reach wait for washed vegetables and fruits.
sentences.chinese: 水槽内加设网架，可存放抹布及待洗的蔬果。

sentences.english: If you get me any more relaxed, I'm going to be like a limp dishrag here.
sentences.chinese: 如果你让我太放松，我可能会瘫软地像块抹布。

definition: to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
